org.apache.ignite.ml.composition

Interface DatasetMapping<L1,L2>

  • Type Parameters:
    L1 - Type of labels before mapping.
    L2 - Type of labels after mapping.

    public interface DatasetMapping<L1,L2>
    This class represents dataset mapping. This is just a tuple of two mappings: one for features and one for labels.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Vector mapFeatures(Vector v)
      Method used to map feature vectors.
      L2 mapLabels(L1 lbl)
      Method used to map labels.
      static <L> DatasetMapping<L,L> mappingFeatures(IgniteFunction<Vector,Vector> mapper)
      Dataset mapping which maps features, leaving labels unaffected.

    • Method Detail

      • mapFeatures

        default Vector mapFeatures(Vector v)
        Method used to map feature vectors.
        Parameters:
        v - Feature vector.
        Returns:
        Mapped feature vector.

      • mapLabels

        L2 mapLabels(L1 lbl)
        Method used to map labels.
        Parameters:
        lbl - Label.
        Returns:
        Mapped label.

      • mappingFeatures

        static <L> DatasetMapping<L,L> mappingFeatures(IgniteFunction<Vector,Vector> mapper)
        Dataset mapping which maps features, leaving labels unaffected.
        Type Parameters:
        L - Type of labels.
        Parameters:
        mapper - Function used to map features.
        Returns:
        Dataset mapping which maps features, leaving labels unaffected.
